ResourceFeature.Name: Wand of Binding
ResourceFeature.Text: This wand has 7 charges for the following properties. It regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Feature.Name: Spells
Feature.Text: While holding the wand, you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 17): hold monster (5 charges) or hold person (2 charges).

Feature.Name: Assisted Escape
Feature.Text: While holding the wand, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge and gain advantage on a saving throw you make to avoid being paralyzed or restrained, or you can expend 1 charge and gain advantage on any check you make to escape a grapple.

MagicProperty.Requirement: Wand, rare (requires attunement by a spellcaster)
